resources.string: the content can not be blank
Are you sure to clear all locally stored alarm logs?
Auto-scan the QR code / barcode inside the box
The file has been converted, please in the album or file management under the Convert folder to view!
As shown above, the top panorama mode screen is divided into nine areas
Double-click any area above, you can view
Select the model of the view:
Scan two-dimensional code to add sharing camera
Format command will ERASE all data of SDCard
Are you sure you want to exit ?
put the QR Code into the frame
Confirm to save this video in phone album?
Select the snapshot you want to delete!
Failed to get device time zone
The device is using the default password:admin,please change the password first
The new password can not be empty
The new password cannot be empty and admin
You cannot set the time zone for the current device
You can\'t switch clarity when talking
Password length must not exceed Thirty-one!
Preset bits must not be greater than 255 or 0!
The camera is upgrading,please do not power off and keep the network available.
You have the latest version already.
A new firmware is available,do you want to update?
Make sure the video is converted to an MP4 file and can be viewed in the album or file manager under the Convert folder
This camera already exists, please enter another one.
The file is being downloading, is it going to be cancelled?
Snyc device time will reboot device, Continue？
You can view downloaded videos under this path: Video - Local - Download
Format command will ERASE all data of SDCard,Continue?
The length you entered is too long
Devices not found on the internet
Please press the reset key for 10 seconds
Successfully modify the password, the camera will be re connected later
Are you sure you want to delete the camera?
Setup Wifi must restart App.Please restart Exit APP
The network has been disconnected, please re Download
Please check the settings to open the relevant application permissions
No SDCard found in your device.
Before click the apply button, please turn the phone volume up to the maximum, and put the phone close to the camera.
password can not contains ~ $ \ \\ = + or space
The port can not be empty or 0
Are you sure to reboot camera?
Setup data will be initialized.Are you sure to reset?
The start time must not be greater than or equal to the end time
The camera you have added before!
Please select the equipment you want to share!
You can only share up to 10 devices at a time
The smaller value, the better image quality, larger flow control
Double-click the magnified view of the area you want to see!
